subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: One moment, the 11-year veteran Ron Artest is sinking the Lakers’ fortunes with impulsive, ill-advised shots. The next, he is sending them into delirium with a game-winning layup.
snippet: One moment, the 11-year veteran Ron Artest is sinking the Lakers’ fortunes with impulsive, ill-advised shots. The next, he is sending them into delirium with a game-winning layup.
